name: Time Counsellor
description:
Windows: Download the .zip, unpack and start time_counsellor.exe.

Mac/Linux: You will need to install the latest version of love2d from https://love2d.org/ . Sorry for the inconvenience!

Fair warning, this game has a lot of text. And I wrote it very quickly.

Developed by Sind and Amadiro
